headline: Furry Welcome: Marriott International and its pet-friendly hotels in Central and South America
summary: Dog Day, celebrated every July 21 in several Latin American countries, is a special date to pay tribute to those faithful companions that fill our days with joy, love and loyalty. In Latin America, traveling with pets has become a growing trend that is driving changes in the tourism industry. According to Hepper.com, 81% of pet owners prefer to stay in pet-friendly hotels rather than other types of accommodation, while a recent analysis by The Business Research Company indicates that the global

headline: PAKUWON GROUP EXPANDS HOSPITALITY PORTFOLIO WITH THE LAUNCH OF ALOFT SURABAYA PAKUWON CITY
summary: A bold new beat is set to energize Surabaya as Pakuwon Group and Marriott International announce the opening of Aloft Surabaya Pakuwon City on 22 August 2025. This launch marks the debut of the Aloft Hotels brand in Surabaya and the first-ever Marriott-branded hotel in the eastern part of the city.

content.title: PAKUWON GROUP EXPANDS HOSPITALITY PORTFOLIO WITH THE LAUNCH OF ALOFT SURABAYA PAKUWON CITY
content.summary: A bold new beat is set to energize Surabaya as Pakuwon Group and Marriott International announce the opening of Aloft Surabaya Pakuwon City on 22 August 2025. This launch marks the debut of the Aloft Hotels brand in Surabaya and the first-ever Marriott-branded hotel in the eastern part of the city.

thumbnail.caption:
Aloft, the First Marriott Hotel in the District
Brings a Bold Global Lifestyle to Indonesia’s Second-Largest City

headline: Bem-vindo, City Express by Marriott -- Now Arriving in Brazil
summary: Marriott International, Inc. announced the signing of seven City Express by Marriott hotels in Brazil with FÁBRICA DE HOTÉIS marking the brand's anticipated debut in the country. This milestone is part of a broader multi-unit development agreement to open 30 City Express by Marriott properties across Brazil's Northeast region over the next 15 years.

content.title: Bem-vindo, City Express by Marriott -- Now Arriving in Brazil
content.summary: Marriott International, Inc. announced the signing of seven City Express by Marriott hotels in Brazil with FÁBRICA DE HOTÉIS marking the brand's anticipated debut in the country. This milestone is part of a broader multi-unit development agreement to open 30 City Express by Marriott properties across Brazil's Northeast region over the next 15 years.

headline: HotelREZ® Appoints Luis Manuel Velarde as Vice President LATAM to Drive Global Expansion
summary: LONDON, July 15, 2025--HotelREZ® Hotels & Resorts, one of the world's largest, fastest-growing, and quality-driven hotel representation companies, announces the appointment of Luis Manuel Velarde as Vice President for Latin America (LATAM). This strategic move underscores HotelREZ’ s commitment to global expansion and regional growth.

content.title: HotelREZ® Appoints Luis Manuel Velarde as Vice President LATAM to Drive Global Expansion
content.summary: LONDON, July 15, 2025--HotelREZ® Hotels & Resorts, one of the world's largest, fastest-growing, and quality-driven hotel representation companies, announces the appointment of Luis Manuel Velarde as Vice President for Latin America (LATAM). This strategic move underscores HotelREZ’ s commitment to global expansion and regional growth.

thumbnail.caption: Luis Manuel Velarde, Vice President LATAM, HotelREZ

headline: Marriott CFO Leeny Oberg to exit, 2 successors named
summary: When Oberg retires in March 2026, company veterans Jen Mason and Shawn Hill will take over as CFO and chief development officer, respectively.

content.title: Marriott CFO Leeny Oberg to exit, 2 successors named
content.summary: When Oberg retires in March 2026, company veterans Jen Mason and Shawn Hill will take over as CFO and chief development officer, respectively.

thumbnail.caption: Leeny Oberg (left) will retire in March 2026. Company veterans Jen Mason (middle) and Shawn Hill (right) will take over as CFO and chief development officer, respectively.

headline: The Westin Singapore Presents "Mind Over Miles" Fireside Chat to Celebrate Third Year with Standard Chartered Singapore Marathon
summary: In celebration of our third year as the Official Elite Hotel of the Standard Chartered Singapore Marathon, The Westin Singapore proudly presents "One Race, Many Journeys: Mind Over Miles" — an inspiring evening of conversation, movement, and community with ultramarathoner, author, and motivational speaker, Natalie Dau, and Singapore-based personal trainer, Gregory Pink. This event is part of our "One Race, Many Journeys" campaign.

content.title: The Westin Singapore Presents "Mind Over Miles" Fireside Chat to Celebrate Third Year with Standard Chartered Singapore Marathon
content.summary: In celebration of our third year as the Official Elite Hotel of the Standard Chartered Singapore Marathon, The Westin Singapore proudly presents "One Race, Many Journeys: Mind Over Miles" — an inspiring evening of conversation, movement, and community with ultramarathoner, author, and motivational speaker, Natalie Dau, and Singapore-based personal trainer, Gregory Pink. This event is part of our "One Race, Many Journeys" campaign.
